amendment.description: To provide for a comprehensive study of the damages to the Alaska Way Viaduct from the Nisqually earthquake to determine whether to repair, retrofit, or replace the Viaduct and whether emergency relief funding should be made available for the Viaduct.

action.text: Amendment SA 624 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Murray to Amendment SA 605.

vote.text: Amendment SA 624 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
